title: Inquiry-Based Learning Design and Workshop for Strengthening Teacher Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design experience and understanding of inquiry-based learning
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate HRD professionals and education leaders, focusing on cultivating inquiry-based learning design capabilities applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Participants can explain three core principles of inquiry-based learning design.
Participants design one or more inquiry-based learning scenarios applicable to real work situations.
Participants will experience the process of developing educational materials at least once through collaborative knowledge sharing with peers.
Participants can explain the designed learning activities by categorizing them into three stages: introduction, development, and conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
